Info

Defines class WriteTemplate with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for write a template content with parameters to a file.

class gen_data_model.pro.write_template.WriteTemplate(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: FileCheck

Defines class WriteTemplate with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for write a template content with parameters to a file.

It defines:

attributes:
_GEN_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
methods:
__init__ - Initials WriteTemplate constructor.
write - write a template content with parameters to a file.
_GEN_VERBOSE: str = 'GEN_DATA_MODEL::PRO::WRITE_TEMPLATE'¶
write(model_content: str | None, model_name: str | None, verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Write a template content with parameters to a file.

Parameters:

  • model_content (<str> | <NoneType>) – Content for model | None

  • model_name (<str> | <NoneType>) – Model name | None

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

True (success operation) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Excptions:

ATSTypeError | ATSValueError
